content: try out this crochet wreath applique pattern link to video https //youtu be/srlomdxbdiw skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -red and green -yarn needle -scissors final size - diameter of 5 5 cm
